name.baseName: cement production|cement, ordinary portland cement, 42.5MPa|new dry process, low-temperature waste heat power generation technology, 2000 t/d|fly ash
水泥生产|水泥, 普通硅酸盐水泥, 42.5MPa|新型干法, 低温余热发电技术, 2000 t/d|粉煤灰

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Laboratory data. New dry process low temperature waste heat power generation. The cement is produced by burning carbide slag generated by the acetylene industry in Heilongjiang. The new dry production line for low-temperature waste heat power generation uses the exhaust gas waste heat from the cooler at the kiln head and the preheater at the kiln tail, which is about 350°C, as the heating energy source. The low-pressure backpressure steam turbine is used for low-temperature waste heat power generation. An AQC waste heat boiler (vertical structure) is installed between the kiln head cooler and the waste gas fan, with a settling chamber before the AQC boiler. An SP waste heat boiler is installed between the kiln tail rotary kiln outlet and the high-temperature fan. The AQC boiler adopts the middle section air extraction with recycled waste gas method, and the original waste gas extraction port is changed into two extraction ports, with one high-temperature extraction port located in the front and one low-temperature extraction port located in the rear. The high-temperature hot air from the front extraction port is recovered after some fly ash is collected in the settling chamber and sent to the AQC boiler, while the low-temperature extraction port is mixed with the AQC boiler outlet air and processed by the original cement production line dust removal system. The waste gas at the kiln tail is cooled and heated by the SP boiler to around 230°C, and a part of it is sent to the raw material mill of the original system by the high-temperature fan, while the other part is humidified in the humidification tower before being sent to the tail gas dust collector. If the power generation system stops operating, the waste gas enters the high-temperature fan through the waste gas pipeline of the original system to ensure the stable operation of the cement production line. Through heat exchange, the boiler produces superheated steam, which is sent to the mixed steam cylinder for mixing and then enters the steam turbine for power generation through the superheated steam pipeline. The low-pressure steam from the steam turbine enters the condenser, where the steam condenses into water, which flows into the hot water well and is then pumped into the vacuum deaerator by a water pump. The water is then pumped into the AQC boiler for circulation by the feedwater pump.

实验室数据。新型干法低温余热发电。 应用黑龙江乙炔化工行业所产生的电石渣烧制水泥。 新型干法生产线低温余热发电的工艺以窑头熟料冷却机和窑尾预热器排出350左右烟气余热作为供热能源，通过低压补汽式汽轮机进行低温余热发电。在窑头冷机和余风风机之间布置一台篦式冷却机（Air Quenching Cooler，AQC）余热锅炉（立式结构），在篦式冷却机（AQC）锅炉之前布置有沉降室；在窑尾一级旋简出口与高温风机之间装一台悬浮预热器（SP）余热锅炉。 篦式冷却机（AQC）锅炉采用中部抽气带余风再循环方式，将原余风抽风口改为两个抽风口，新开抽风口一个靠前一个挪后，靠前的高温抽风口热风经沉降室回收部分飞灰后送至篦式冷却机（AQC）锅炉，挪后的低温抽风与篦式冷却机（AQC）锅炉出风混合后经原水泥生产线的除尘系统处理。窑尾废气经悬浮预热器（SP）锅炉吸热降温至230C左右，由高温风机将一部分送至原系统的生料磨，另外一部分经增湿塔增湿后至察尾收尘器若发电系统停用，则废气经原系统的废气管道进入高温风机，可确保水泥生产线稳定运行。 通过热能交换，锅炉产生过热蒸汽，送到分汽缸进行混合，然后通过过热蒸汽管进入汽轮机发电。经汽轮机的乏汽进入凝汽器，蒸汽在凝汽器中凝结成水，汇入热水井，然后由水泵送往真空除氧器，再经给水泵泵入篦式冷却机（AQC）锅炉循环使用。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: Mudanjiang New Material Technology Co., Ltd.
牡丹江新材料科技有限公司

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: Using the usability of cement with a compressive strength of 42.5 MPa after 28 days, which corresponds to 1 kg, as the functional unit, i.e. 1FU = 42.5 kg MPa. The evaluation scope covers raw material preparation, clinker calcination, and cement production. The environmental impact caused by the consumption of clay resources is not considered. Iron powder is a correction material and its environmental impact is not considered. The waste mainly includes nitrogen oxides, sulfur dioxide, carbon dioxide, and dust in the output of the product system.
以1kg28天抗压强度为42.5MPa的水泥所具有的使用性能作为功能单位，即1Fu=42.5kgMPa。评价范围为生料准备、熟料煅烧和水泥制备。粘土类资源消耗造成的环境负荷暂不考虑。铁粉属于铁质校正材料，其引发的环境影响不予考虑。产品系统输出端考虑排放的废弃物主要包括氮氧化物、二氧化硫、二氧化碳及粉尘。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Based on the energy-saving technology transformation design of the new dry process waste heat utilization of Mudanjiang New Material Technology Co., Ltd., the input and output data of the determined product system were collected, and the data was calculated and quantified. (1) Available waste heat conditions: There are two 2000t/d new dry process production lines. To ensure the quality of waste heat, the inlet air of the waste heat furnace at the kiln head is extracted from the middle of the cooler, with an air volume of 2x170329Nm^3/h. The waste gas temperature is 360°C, and the waste heat utilization temperature range is 360~86°C, with a heat of 12302E+4kJ/h. The inlet air of the tail preheater is 2x203147Nm^3/h, and the waste gas temperature is 350°C. Considering the heat consumption of coal grinding, the waste heat utilization range is 350-205°C, with a heat of 7927E+4kJ/h. (2) Installed capacity: The waste heat at the kiln tail is utilized to set up two kiln tail waste heat boilers, which can produce 2x13.5t/h-1.35Mpa-320℃ superheated steam. The waste heat at the kiln head cooler is utilized to set up two kiln head waste heat boilers, which can produce 2x9.0t/h-1.35Mpa-345℃ superheated steam and 62t/h-170℃ hot water. Among them, 44t/h of hot water is supplied to the kiln head and tail waste heat boilers to produce main steam, and 18t/h is supplied to the flash steam production of the turbine room. According to the main steam quality produced by the waste heat boiler, a back-pressure steam turbine is selected, with a main steam parameter of 1.25MPa-320℃. The head and tail waste heat boilers together produce 45t/h of main steam, and the head boiler produces 5t/h of low-pressure steam. Calculated based on the overall efficiency of the turbine and generator of 80.5%, the average waste heat power generation is 8600kW. (3) Energy-saving electricity: According to the actual operation of the low-temperature waste heat power plant and the power generation efficiency, the average power generation of the power plant is 8600kW. Calculated based on a year-round operation of 7200 hours, the annual power generation is 6192E+4kWh. Subtracting the power plant's own use rate of 7.8%, which is 483E+4kWh, the actual electricity supplied by the waste heat power plant to the production line is 5709E+4kWh. (4) Reduce emissions: A disturbance-type separator is installed at the inlet of the waste heat boiler flue gas, which is conducive to the settling of dust in the waste gas, reducing the dust content in the cement kiln waste gas by nearly 50%. Since thermal power is used in the north for power generation, saving electricity reduces the emissions of CO2, SO2, and NOx caused by coal combustion during power generation. Through the above analysis, the data for the environmental impact assessment catalog analysis of the cement industry under the low-temperature waste heat power generation scheme of the new dry process was obtained.

结合牡丹江新材料科技有限公司新型干法余热利用节能技术改造设计，对所确定产品系统的输入、输出数据进行收集，并对数据进行了计算、量化。 （1）可利用余热条件。2000t/d新型干法生产线2条。为保证余热品质，窑头余热炉进风从馆冷机中部抽取，取风量为2x170329Nm^3/h，废气温度360，余热利用温度范围360~86，具有12302E+4kJ/h的热量；尾预热器取风量2x203147Nm^3/h，废气温度350，考虑煤磨供干耗热，余热利用范围350-205，具有7927E+4kJ/h的热量。 （2）装机容量。利用窑尾废气余热，设置窑尾余热锅炉，2台窑尾余热锅炉可生产2x13.5t/h-1.35Mpa-320过热蒸汽；利用窑头熟料冷却机废气余热，设置窑头余热锅炉，2台窑头余热锅炉可生产2x9.0t/h-1.35Mpa-345过热蒸汽，同时生产62t/h-170热水，其中44t/h供给窑头和尾余热锅炉生产主蒸汽，18t/h供给汽轮机房闪蒸生产低压饱和蒸汽。根据余热锅炉所能产生的主汽品味，选用补汽进汽式汽轮机，主蒸汽参数为1.25MPa-320；头、尾共生产主蒸汽量45t/h，头锅炉生产的低压蒸汽量5t/h；按汽轮机和发电机整体效率805%计算，平均余热发电功率为8600kW. （3）节约电能。根据低温余热电站实际运行状况和发电效率，电站平均发电功率为8600kW，以年运行7200h计算，年发电6192E+4kWh；扣除7.8%电站自用电率，即483E+4kWh，余热电站实际向生产线供电5709E+4kWh。 （4）减少排放。余热锅炉废气入口处设置干扰式分离器，有利于废气中粉尘沉降，使水泥窑废气中粉尘含量下降近50%；由于北方采用火力发电，故节约电能减少发电过程中煤燃烧引发的CO2、SO2及NOx排放。 通过上述分析，计算获取新型干法低温余热发电方案下，水泥工业环境影响评价编目分析数据。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 于淼. (2008). 黑龙江水泥工业可持续发展研究 [硕士, 哈尔滨工业大学].

exchange.generalComment: Standard coal. The original data is 0.0934kg standard coal, here converted to hard coal, the conversion formula is 1kg hard coal = 0.929kg standard coal.
标准煤。原始数据为0.0934kg标准煤，这里换算为硬煤，换算公式为1kg硬煤=0.929kg标准煤。
